snippet: Lawyers for a former British resident imprisoned at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, asked a judge to free him because of failing health — a new tactic in seeking a detainee’s release.
abstract: Lawyers for Shaker Aamer, last former British resident imprisoned at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, are asking federal judge to order his release because of his failing health--new tactic in seeking a detainee's release.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for a former British resident imprisoned at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, asked a judge to free him because of failing health — a new tactic in seeking a detainee’s release.

headline.main: Lawyers for a Guantánamo Detainee Cite Failing Health in Seeking His Release
